title: Jill Stein's got the re-account boxes for the marijuana dinner party.
subtitle: An old picture of Jill Stein was used to claim that the GPP candidate was arrested for using "counting money" to host "Marijuana Dinner."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: I arrested Jill Stein and accused of embezzling money collected for the 2016 recount effort to set up a marijuana dinner party.
